resources.string: Canary uses your location to determine your address, local emergency numbers, and to automatically switch modes.
This event will stay on the location timeline for %1$d days after it took place.
This event will stay on the location timeline for %1$d hours after it took place.
This event is older than 7 days and will be deleted from your timeline if it is unsaved.
This event is older than %1$d days and will no longer be visible on the location timeline.
This event is older than %1$d hours and will no longer be visible on the location timeline.

Canary measures your home\'s humidity, which is an indication of how much water vapor is in the air. Humidity goes hand in hand with temperature, and can affect a number of health and structural factors in your house or apartment.
Canary assesses your home\'s air quality the amount of contaminants in the air and shows you what\'s inside and outside the normal range for your specific environment.
Canary detects overall changes in air quality caused by pollutants including:
Keep Canary\'s air quality sensor calibrated by ventilating your home with outside air. Make a habit of opening windows or doors to let fresh air in and to help Canary stay as accurate as possible.
Your Canary All-in-One is establishing a secure connection
Videos, mode changes, comings, and goings - all show up here
Your Canary All-in-One is connected to the internet. Unplug both ends of the yellow cable to complete setup.
HomeHealth graphs and history work best after 24 hours. Check back again tomorrow!
How will you connect your device to the internet?
Please accept Canary\'s terms and policies before proceeding.
Canary strongly recommends using your device with a password-protected Wi-Fi network.
Canary cannot connect to hidden Wi-Fi networks during setup.
Error occurred during OTA, please try again.
How will you change Canary\'s\nconnection to the internet?

Next, unplug the micro-USB
power adapter from your Canary
and then plug it back in. Canary
flashes yellow when it is ready.
Are you sure you want to call the Police Department?
Are you sure you want to call the Fire Department?

Your newest Canary failed to update successfully. Please restart setup on this Canary device to fix this issue.
This location is now in Privacy mode. Watch live has been disabled.

Canary tracks your home\'s climate and shows you real-time temperature readings along with recent heat spikes or drops. These measurements can help you monitor your comfort, your utilities bill, and your safety.
Motion-activated video when all members were away will appear here.
When all members are away Canary monitors for activity and sends notifications.
When a member is home Canary is customizable. You can set notification and privacy preferences.
You can schedule Canary to notify you when motion is detected while you sleep.
To add them to this location again, send a new invitation.
Canary works best when everyone in the home is connected as a location member.
This person will have access to this location’s devices and timeline entries.
Are you sure you want to sign out?
This entry was recently deleted and no longer can be viewed.
This event will be permanently deleted from your timeline and will no longer be visible to shared location members.
You\'ll receive a notification when this video is ready to download.
Your videos are being prepared to share.
You will receive a notification when they are ready.
Canary recommends downloading videos over Wi-Fi. Downloading large video files over cellular network may incur large data fees.
Check the Wi-Fi password for this\nwireless network and re-enter it below.
Check your router\'s internet connection, range, and that it can broadcast at 2.4 GHz.
Your device failed to start OTA.
The email addresses you submitted do not match. Please try again.
The passwords you submitted do not match. Please try again.
Turning on Wi-Fi will improve location accuracy and auto-mode switching
Your download has started. You can view it in your Download Application.
GPS is not enabled. Do you want to go to settings to enable it?
Password must contain at\nleast 1 number or special\ncharacter.
This Location is in Privacy Mode
Receive a notification when your device goes offline for more than a few minutes.
Set a min and max to be notified when temperature, humidity, or air quality are out of range.
Location accuracy is\nbest when Wi-Fi is on.

Immediately respond to what's
happening at home. Tap here to
sound the 90+ dB siren or contact
the authorities closest to your
home or apartment.
Comment on an event so you can\nkeep everyone in your home up to\ndate about what\'s happening.
The flag icon turns green when you\nsave an event to the Canary Cloud.
Tap to see the date selector to quickly glance at everything that happened on any specific day.
The more button lets you delete unwanted events from the timeline or download the most important ones.
Your profile is where you can add a photo, change personal details, or set preferences, like degree type.
Add four Canary devices to your location. That\'s one by the front door and others in the living room, kids room, or anywhere else.
Here you control auto-mode switching, which automatically changes the mode when you\'re home to disarmed or privacy.

Tag events as kids, pets, or
roommates, and add labels of your
own. Your feedback teaches Canary
which events are normal, and which
ones need your attention.
Here you control auto-mode switching, which automatically changes the mode to disarmed or privacy, when you get home.
Canary works best when everyone in your home is connected to it. Tap here to contact other members like your family or roommates.

Canary's free plan comes with access
to the past 24 hours of activity
and storage of five saved events
on the Canary Cloud.

For additional support, storage, or
call center options, Canary offers
contract-free monthly service plans
for your home or apartment.

This connection is not trusted by Canary and may allow unauthorized access to your account.\n\nIf this connection is secure, choose to allow untrusted connections in My Profile or try again on a different connection.
Update will replace your current emergency numbers with the latest numbers for this location\'s address.
Update location\'s emergency numbers to this address?
Adjust motion sensitivity to customize the amount of notifications Canary sends.
To connect Canary using Wi-Fi, turn your smartphone\'s Wi-Fi on.
Touch the top of your device until it flashes blue. When detected, your device will appear for confirmation.
Touch the top of your device until it flashes blue and is automatically detected by your smartphone.
This will remove the device from this location and account and reset its settings. Location members will not be able to access past activity.
This will remove the device from this location and account and reset its settings. Past activity from this device will remain on your Timeline.
Check your password and enter it again to remove this device.
Your phone was unable to connect to Canary.
Unplug all cables from your device. Then, starting with the yellow audio cable, plug them back in and try again.
This device cannot be securely removed from your location. To remove this device contact Canary.
Enable debugging to frequently share your phone\'s location with Canary if it has been requested by Canary Customer Support.
Take a quick tutorial to learn how to navigate the Canary app and live life in the know.
Tap Watch Live to see everything as it happens in your Home.
View current HomeHealth right here or tap to view temperature, humidity, and air quality history.
Tap down here to change between away, home, or night mode.
Tap the menu to add another Canary, adjust settings, or get help. That\'s all! If you ever want to restart the tutorial, find it in Get Help.
Canary could not connect to Wi‑Fi because the password is incorrect.
Canary could not connect to Wi‑Fi because the network was not found.
Timeout has occurred while trying to connect to a Wi‑Fi network.
Canary could not connect to Wi‑Fi, please try again. If the problem continues, contact customer support.
Canary uses your location to automatically switch modes when you come and go, and to determine your address and local emergency phone numbers.
We noticed you speak %1$s. Would you like to update your launguage settings?
This change will translate the app and new events on the timeline to %1$s.
This change will translate the app and new events on the timeline to %1$s. You will return to the Home Screen when the update is complete. To change your language again, edit your profile settings.
You haven’t bookmarked any events. Tap the bookmark icon to save them here
Which video do you want to share?
Your video is ready to share.

Canary can automatically switch between Away and Home modes as people come and go from this location. Auto-mode switching improves when Wi-Fi is enabled. When off, location members must manually switch between modes.
When a member is home Canary is customizable. You can set notification and privacy preferences.
Schedule Canary to monitor for activity while you sleep. Please note:
Your Canary will only switch to night mode if someone is home
Notifications will be silenced if your phone is set to \'Do Not Disturb\'
Canary’s modes empower you to personalize your experience. Review all the ways in this quick tutorial.
Set Canary to private anytime to completely turn off audio and video recording.
Canary’s modes help you personalize your experience. Learn how in this quick tutorial.
Easily keep an eye on Wi-Fi and\n battery for your wireless Canary Flex.
When you are away Canary notifies you when motion is detected.
When you are home notification and privacy preferences are customizable.
Get started with your new features!
Nothing will change automatically–your previous preferences will carry over. Or you can explore Canary’s new mode options in the settings menu. Enjoy!
Your Canary needs to update to the latest firmware. This can take several minutes. Do not unplug your device.
Your Canary Flex needs to update to the latest firmware. This can take several minutes. Do not unplug your device.
Your Canary View needs to update to the latest firmware. This can take several minutes. Do not unplug your device.
In the meantime, take a moment to learn more about how Canary works.
Night mode works best on a schedule. Set Canary to switch to night mode when you sleep, so you’re always protected.
Schedule applies to each day of the week in the location’s timezone.
Receive a notification when a device\'s power source is changed, such as unplugged and using battery power.
Receive a notification when Canary Flex is fully charged.
You can adjust how much motion Canary Flex records to prolong its battery life per charge.
On normal battery, Canary Flex records motion within a 20\' range.
On battery saver, Canary Flex reduces its range to ignore smaller and farther away motion to prolong battery life.
To preserve battery, capture video closer to the device. Or use more battery and capture all motion within the range of the device.
Canary makes insurance smarter and more affordable.
To see if you’re eligible for discounts on your insurance premium, select your provider below.
Contact your agent and request the \"Local Burglar Alarm\" level discount under the State Farm Home Alert Protection Discount.
Call (800) 699–3739, dial \"2\" for Customer Service, and request the self-monitored "Theft Protection Discount".
No documentation of installation is required. Discount and discount level availability varies by state. Discount currently not offered for Flex devices.
We work with insurance providers to bring you discounts on your insurance premium and to make insurance more intelligent in the future.
Help Canary make your insurance smarter.

By sharing data from your Canary with your insurance provider (such as sensor readings and alert frequency), you can speed up analysis and unlock deeper discounts in the future. Video and audio will never be shared and you can opt out at any time.
Use wire-free at any time. You can plug your device into a weatherproof, covered outlet if you see a green dot on the bottom of the power adapter.
Position your device on a flat surface with a clear field of view, 3 to 5 feet off the ground.
If connecting to Wi-Fi, keep your device in range of your Wi-Fi router to maintain a strong internet connection.
If outdoors, protect your device from direct sunlight by placing it under a overhang or in a shady area.
If you choose to use Wi-Fi, keep your device in range of your router to maintain a strong internet connection.
When the light is blue, tap the button on the back of your device to initiate pairing.
Tap the button on the back of your device to initiate pairing.
Confirm the device you are activating.

Securely plug an Ethernet cable into the back of your Canary. Connect the other end to your router.
Plug the yellow audio cable into the back of your device. Connect the other end into your phone’s audio jack.
Your Canary needs to use audio signals to establish a secure connection. Please allow Canary to access your phone’s microphone.
Your phone’s volume setting is too low. Slide it all the way up, so that your phone can communicate with your device.

Your device warranty will be extended to two years from your original purchase date.

Add Membership to your location to add more than 4 devices. Plus get a 30-day video timeline, home deductible reimbursement and more.

Did you know that Canary has a number of tools to customize your motion notifications?
Why don’t I receive notifications from Canary?
Mask out areas that Canary should ignore to reduce unwanted notifications.
Masks are a great way to reduce unwanted notifications. Canary will ignore motion inside a mask.
Keep in mind, if your device is moved, you may need to adjust your mask for accuracy.
Preferences saved! Adjust them anytime from the Settings menu.
Allow camera access through App permissions.

Data saver is turned on. For accurate auto-mode switching, allow unrestricted access for Canary.
Your geofence is a perimeter around your location that is used to know when location members are home or away. It controls things like auto-mode switching.
Your geofence is a perimeter around your location that determines when location members are home or away. You can edit it anytime.
A small size is most accurate. Increasing the size can help with troubleshooting.
Move the map below to adjust the exact position of your location’s geofence.

Tap this card to set up a device at a new address.
Canary Talk is disabled when set to private. Switch modes to enable Canary Talk.
Devices must be online to use Canary Talk. Please ensure your device is connected to the internet.
Canary works best when everyone in your home connects. Use this shortcut to quickly add people to Canary.
For the next month, access full-length videos and extend your timeline from 24 hours to 30 days.

Use two-way Canary Talk to have real-time conversations.
Canary Talk uses your device’s microphone to allow you to speak through your Canary’s speaker.

With Canary Membership, get unlimited access to full videos on a 30-day timeline, plus Canary Talk and more.
